title: HSS 2Night Week 5 Play of the Week
text:

Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs HSS 2Night Week 5 Play of the Week Layton Hahn of North Central earns this week's honor after his tremendous catch against Lewis %26 Clark. Evan Closky, KREM2 Sports Reporter 5:47 p.m. PDT October 4, 2015 North Central's Layton Hahn earns Week 5's 'Play of the Week' honors with his slick catch against Lewis & Clark at Joe Albi Stadium. (Photo: KREM2) CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
We are halfway through the prep football season and North Central's Layton Hahn earns Week 5 'Play of the Week' honors after his remarkable catch against Lewis & Clark Friday at Joe Albi Stadium. 
With time running out in the 2nd quarter, Riley Smith chucks a ball down the field for his receiver. It originally looks like it is going to be picked off by Tigers defender David McKinzy, but Hahn tips the ball to himself and comes down with the catch. This play would later lead to a touchdown. 
North Central would lose to Lewis & Clark 38-14. 
We will be spotlighting a play every Sunday on KREM 2 News. Make sure to join Darnay Tripp and Evan Closky for HSS 2Night Friday nights on KREM 2 News at 11. Read or Share this story: http://on.krem.com/1RpTAUc TOP VIDEOS
